agent_purpose: Processes user text prompts, enhances them for optimal image generation, and returns structured JSON with enhanced_prompt, style_suggestion, size_recommendation, quality_notes, and original_prompt
description: Image generation prompt enhancer agent that takes user text prompts, enriches them with detailed visual descriptions, and provides style, size, and quality recommendations for optimal image generation.

result.summary: Sample enhanced prompt and image generation details

data.enhanced_prompt: A serene landscape featuring a crystal-clear mountain lake surrounded by pine trees, with snow-capped mountains in the background under a golden sunrise. Mist drifts over the water, and gentle ripples reflect the vibrant sky.
data.quality_notes: Use high resolution and fine details, prioritize realistic lighting and reflective surfaces for maximum visual impact.
